name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Detail-oriented Manual Tester / Support Engineer with 10+ years of expertise in software solutions, specializing in **SQL**, **MySQL**, **AWS**, and **Azure**. Proficient in executing manual testing strategies and proficiently tracking bugs using tools like **JIRA** and **GitHub Issues**. Adept at communicating complex technical issues clearly while collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure high-quality deliverables. Strong problem-solving skills with a demonstrated ability to analyze and resolve issues efficiently. Experienced in the full development lifecycle, with familiarity in front-end frameworks such as **Vue.js**. Brings a wealth of knowledge from a solid background in full stack development, including technologies like **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **Django**, combined with a commitment to quality assurance and compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Conducted manual testing procedures across various applications to ensure compliance with regulatory standards like HIPAA, FHIR, and SOX while utilizing **JIRA** and **GitHub Issues** for efficient bug tracking and communication.
•	Executed rigorous SQL queries to validate data integrity in **MySQL** and **PostgreSQL**, performing comprehensive data verification against expected outcomes in healthcare and finance systems.
•	Collaborated with development teams to identify and document bugs, enhancing problem-solving methodologies, and contributing to the improvement of application functionality.
•	Participated in the design and implementation of **Azure** and **AWS** based solutions, ensuring robust backend performance and facilitating smooth user experiences in web applications built using **Vue.js**.
•	Developed test cases and executed functional and regression testing on applications built using technologies like **React** and **Node.js**, ensuring reliability and performance.
•	Engaged in communication with stakeholders to gather requirements and provide updates on testing progress, contributing to overall project transparency.
•	Analyzed and reported testing results, utilizing metrics to track quality assurance progress and enhance future testing strategies over **3+ major releases** per quarter.
•	Leveraged professional problem-solving skills to troubleshoot issues effectively, minimizing project delays and enhancing software delivery times with an average reduction of **20%** across teams.
•	Facilitated cross-functional training sessions for team members on testing methodologies, fostering a culture of quality awareness across **5 teams** within the organization.

Conducted **manual testing** of financial applications to ensure seamless functionality, resulting in a **30% reduction** in post-deployment defects.
Utilized **bug tracking** tools such as **JIRA** and **GitHub Issues** to document and track issues, enhancing communication between development and QA teams.
Executed SQL queries in **MySQL** databases to validate data integrity and accuracy, supporting decision-making processes with reliable information.
Collaborated effectively within cross-functional teams, leveraging **problem-solving** skills to address and resolve technical issues promptly, ensuring project deadlines were met with a **95% success rate**.
Engaged in thorough regression testing post-deployment, providing valuable feedback to improve product quality and user experience.
Enhanced application performance by suggesting optimizations based on testing outcomes and user feedback, contributing to a **20% increase** in application efficiency.
Participated in daily stand-ups and sprint planning to align testing strategies with project objectives, demonstrating solid **communication** skills and contributing to team success.
Assisted in automating **manual testing** processes using **Vue.js** and integrated testing frameworks, improving test coverage and reducing testing time by **40%**.

Conducted **manual testing** to ensure the quality and functionality of applications, utilizing **JIRA** for efficient **bug tracking** and reporting enhancements to streamline workflows.
Collaborated with development teams using **GitHub Issues** for issue management and communication, effectively advocating for user requirements and ensuring clarity in specifications.
Utilized **SQL** and **MySQL** for database querying during testing phases to validate data integrity and optimize performance, resulting in a **30%** improvement in query response times.
Developed detailed test plans and cases based on product specifications, enhancing problem-solving approaches that led to a **25%** reduction in high-priority bugs post-release.
Participated in daily stand-ups and retrospective meetings, fostering strong **communication** within the team to promote transparency and facilitate continuous improvement in testing methodologies.
Assisted in troubleshooting production issues, demonstrating resilience and analytical skills by swiftly identifying and resolving **critical bugs**, significantly improving end-user satisfaction scores by **15%**.
Engaged with cloud platforms such as **AWS** and **Azure** to test system integrations, contributing to the robustness and scalability of cloud-based applications.
Provided support for ongoing testing efforts during Agile sprints, advocating user needs to enhance the overall product experience and ensure timely delivery against project milestones.
